data.message: I think that if I put a privacy setting not wanting to be found on FB, you should respect that. there's some people I don't want in my life, and I don't want to be found by them. Why are you changing this? It's stupid.

replies.message: Not only that, they will be able to search for you on Google now also

Also a new problem has arisen-  Why is it, when a person likes something I shared, do I get a page the has a Bandaged Thumb and say "This page is not working or has been taken down by sender" but when I go to my Timeline the item I shared is still on my Timeline and have to search timeline to see what people liked or commented on by random finding.
